recipe.title: Classic Apple Pie
recipe.description: Traditional American dessert with flaky crust and cinnamon apples

on_enter.say: Right, let's preheat the oven to two hundred degrees celsius, which is about four hundred degrees fahrenheit. This will get it nice and hot for our pie.

steps.descr: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and lemon juice
steps.instructions: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and lemon juice

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix those lovely apples with the sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Give it a good stir until everything's nicely coated.

steps.descr: Roll out half the pastry and line a pie dish
steps.instructions: Roll out half the pastry and line a pie dish

on_enter.say: Let's roll out half of that lovely pastry and gently line your pie dish. Take your time to get it nice and even.
Now, let's fill that pastry-lined dish with our delicious apple mixture. Spread it out evenly.

steps.descr: Cover with remaining pastry, seal edges
steps.instructions: Cover with remaining pastry, seal edges

on_enter.say: Time to cover the pie with the remaining pastry. Press the edges down to seal it all in. Lovely!

steps.descr: Brush with beaten egg, make slits for steam
steps.instructions: Brush with beaten egg, make slits for steam

on_enter.say: Let's brush the top with that beaten egg for a beautiful golden finish. Don't forget to make a few slits for the steam to escape.

steps.descr: Bake 45 minutes until golden, cool before serving
steps.instructions: Bake 45 minutes until golden, cool before serving

on_enter.say: Pop the pie in the oven and bake it for forty-five minutes until it's beautifully golden. Let it cool a bit before serving, if you can wait!

notes.text:
Use a mix of sweet and tart apples
Chill pastry before rolling for easier handling
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream
